experience: You and Marie both know Matt De Jesus, Steve Gottry, and 21 others

Hummingbird Productions, LLC is a full service turnkey video production company with offices and crews in Spokane and Seattle, Washington as well as Phoenix, Arizona. Marie Marx Strohm and her diverse team of seasoned professionals have taken their more than 25 years of video production experience, expertise and passion for their work throughout the US and Canada, Europe and China. Have camera, will travel!

This job was the final piece of experience and expertise needed before starting my own company Hummingbird Productions, LLC. From cell phones to satellites, I traveled throughout the US producing videos for Motorola live shows, documenting the milestone accomplishments of the Iridium program and many, many new product rollouts. This company was a blessing at the perfect moment in my career path. Great people as well---and you know exactly who you are!

The position of public relations director included writing weekly press releases; setting up interviews for radio/TV/print with guest artists such as Yo Yo Ma, Pinkus Zuckerman and Placido Domingo; arranging television coverage for all major events and helping to develop comprehensive ad campaigns to develop the Phoenix Symphony brand worldwide through radio/television and print.

KPNX 12 News was my first big break that took me from radio talk show producer (KFYI AM) and news director (KOOL FM) to restaurant critic and field reporter for Arizona Today, a daily news magazine format talk show hosted by Wenatchee native, Ron Hoon. After the show was cancelled I found myself in the daily news mayhem of live TV. I learned so much from this experience and it set me on an exciting, ever evolving media path that continues to this day.

National Merit Scholar, Girls State, Kappa Delta Pi (International Honor Society in the Field of Education), President of the Board of Directors, Girls Ranch, Inc. of Arizona, Sierra Club Member, Advisory Board Autoimmune Advocacy Alliance, Seattle, Member Rotary 21 (Program Committee, Civic Affairs Committee, Kidfest Committee, Communications Committee, Greeter).

While teaching English grammar and writing as a student teacher in 1974, I started a small non-profit in an inner city Seattle special education high school. The program provided basic hygiene toiletry items and how to use them along with nutrition classes to my students who learned differently. I learned that all a company could say was "no" and more often than not, they said "yes." With generous donations from companies such as AVON and Bonne Belle, the program continued to expand and soon became part of the school's curriculum that is still being taught today.

Spokane's Rotary Club 21 advances the ideals of service above self, understanding, goodwill and peace. I currently serve as co-chair of the Civic Affairs Committee and member of the Program Committee, KidFest committee, Communications Committee and Greeters Committee.

Carole Bartholomeaux
President at BARTHOLOMEAUX/PR and Owner, BARTHOLOMEAUX/PR
July 12, 2009, Carole was a client of Marie’s

Marie Strohm is an amazing person and a consummate professional.  As a videographer she works with the client to be sure she understands the client's needs and, at the same time, keeps on time and on budget.  She is a delight with whom to work.  I have hired Marie on several occasions for a variety of client's including best selling author Clive Cussler and I will continue to do so.  Having worked in public relations since I was in college, I can attest that if you need a good TV commercial or a compelling video brochure, there is no one I know better than this multi-Telly Award winning producer.

Alix Compton
Director of External Relations at KCSARC
October 30, 2011, Alix was a client of Marie’s

I had the pleasure of working with Alix Compton when she asked my company, Green Planet Video Productions to produce a presentation for Bellwether's inaugural fundraising event. From pre-production brainstorm to screening the video at Benaroya Hall, Alix played a key role in coordinating every detail of the production. She is a consummate professional with a sharp, creative mind, a woman who knows exactly what she's doing, can turn on a dime, guaranteeing a successful event every time. It's my pleasure to highly recommend Alix Compton.

Debbe Hirata
Voice Actor at Jason Marks Talent Management
July 20, 2010, Marie was a client of Debbe’s

Honestly, does it get any better than Debbe Hirata? I hired her to voice my precious documentary film on Canada's environmental debacle---the Alberta Tar Sands and the proposed Enbridge pipeline and subsequent tanker traffic down British Columbia's pristine, environmentally fragile coast to the sea. She studied the issue and made it her own so that when it came time to narrate the film--she just got it. Debbe is beyond my wildest dream as a writer---my words came alive and their weight and meaning were at once illuminated by this incredibly gifted voice talent and enlightened human being. Hire her. That's all I can say.

summary: Specializing in environmental long and short format documentaries and focused, articulate message driven marketing and fundraising presentations, Hummingbird Productions, LLC http://www.hbirdprod.com is the culmination of more than 25 years of award winning network, corporate and nonprofit video production experience by principal, Marie Marx Strohm. Headquartered in the Inland Northwest city of Spokane, Washington, turnkey capabilities include high concept creative, script writing, state of the art 3D animation and motion graphics, high definition videography and comprehensive post-production facilities. With numerous awards including Best Documentary Short from the Los Angeles Independent Film Festival,  Winner of the Hollywood International Independent Documentary Awards and  11 Tellies, our diverse roster of clients has taken us throughout the US, Europe, Asia and Canada to produce network quality television commercials, long and short format documentaries,  fundraising presentations, live event scripting and content, 2D and 3D animation, marketing product rollouts, custom crafted social media videos, You Tube shorts, website videos …If it’s a video you need, we can do it!Marie Marx Strohm and her talented team of seasoned professionals promise to tell your story in the most original, creative, compelling and attention-grabbing way. Hummingbird Productions: highest network quality, competitive rates and fantastic results!
name: Marie Marx Strohm
title: Principal, Hummingbird Productions, LLC
